definition: capable of being molded or modeled (especially of earth or clay or other soft material)
details:
adjective
- capable of being molded or modeled (especially of earth or clay or other soft material)
= synonyms: plastic
- susceptible to being led or directed
= example: susceptible to being led or directed
= synonyms: pliable
- of or relating to the craft of pottery
= example: of or relating to the craft of pottery
